name: ps4-loader
author: janisslsm
description: PS4 ELF/PRX loader plugin for Binary Ninja

installinstructions.Darwin: Place/Clone the plugin dir/repository into the users plugin folder. ~/Library/Application Support/Binary Ninja/plugins/
installinstructions.Windows: Place/Clone the plugin dir/repository into the users plugin folder: %APPDATA%\Binary Ninja\plugins
installinstructions.Linux: Place/Clone the plugin dir/repository into the users plugin folder: ~/.binaryninja/plugins/
